text: Your answer was right. Keep up the good work!

“Success is like pregancy. Everybody congratulates you but nobody knows, how many times you got fucked to achieve it.”
“He knows all the answers, has not been asked all the questions.”
“Everyone has a photographic memory, some people just don’t have film!”
“Sometimes you succeed, and other times you learn.”
Nicely Done! You earned your gold star for today ⭐
